attributes.action: Get schools teaching actual black history and not just the bad bits about politicianry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and my group would like to get the Prime Minister to now change the schooling of our ever growing population of children. At the moment, in school you are only taught about politicianry. I propose we start teaching about all aspects of black culture, from our achievement, education, our battles, our successes and all that makes our race great so that we can face racism head on and show we are no different from any other race. I'm not saying we should rid of all other history studies, just add black history to our children and our future childrens education schemes.
